rooms.description: Open entrance hall with a reception area and shoe storage area.
Spacious living room with access to balcony for socializing, designed following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Open plan dining area connected to the kitchen.
Modern industrial-style kitchen with stainless steel fixtures and ample counter space. Designed to optimize workflow.
Master bedroom with private balcony designed for restful sleep, Vastu aligned bed placement.
Second bedroom with a spacious balcony ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Third bedroom with an adjoining balcony that integrates Vastu principles for positive energy circulation.
Fourth bedroom with a dedicated balcony, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
Fifth bedroom with a spacious balcony to foster relaxation.
Primary bathroom designed for master bedroom, incorporating modern fixtures and Vastu-aligned water placement.
Small utility room for laundry and storage, ensuring smooth functionality.

openings.description: Main entrance door with industrial design elements.
Large window providing natural light and ventilation.
Door connecting the kitchen to the living area.
Balcony window ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
Balcony door for additional access to the balcony.
Balcony door for seamless access to outdoor space.
Window with balcony design ensuring natural lighting.
Garage door for two-car garage access.

garden.description: Large garden integrated with the house design following Vastu principles to promote harmony and positive energy flow, featuring landscaping that includes native plants and water features.

garage.description: Spacious two-car garage with modern industrial finishes and ample storage space for vehicles and tools.
